list.title: Units Converter (Mobile App)
list.description: Mobile App that converts several types of units. It has adds with Google AdMob and it is deployed on Google Play. It uses local memory to store favorites, last type of unit used, and last unit selected. It has different languages and users can choose over several color themes.

list.title: My Site (Web Site)
list.description: It is this website you are exploring right now. To test the responsive design please refresh the site in the desired window size, cause some components are rendered depending on it.
